content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Chinese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Radio report
content.question: The radio report is announcing what type of event?

choices.label: The promotion of a new book
The dedication of a new cultural center
A fund-raiser to support a public library
The opening of a new teahouse

content.answer: The promotion of a new book

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
